Description: Festina chronograph alarm miyota 3s10 3510 (Breitling cal.59 movement)+ VIDEO Sets. resets to zero. Keeps time. Alarm works. It is beeping when you press the buttons. Please check the pictures. If you check the pictures you will notice some little scuffs, surface scratches, colours fading, dent, bents or other signs.Bracelet in used condition, signed Festina. Will fit a maximum 16 cm wrist. Watch size: ca.39mm Any questions, please ask.Movement Miyota 3s10: works fine, resets, sets the alarm. Same movement used on Breitling Jupiter / Pilothttp://forums.watchuseek.com/f39/breitling-jupiter-jupiter-pilot-brief-history-aid-identification-91.html *********************************************************** TERMS & CONDITIONSPOSTAGE & SHIPPINGAll watches sold as is, shown/described. Pictures are part of my description!! I have tried to be as accurate as possible in the description, but if you have any other question, please ask. Please Bear in mind that photo may slightly different from actual item in terms of color due to the lighting during photo shooting or the monitor's display. I guarantee all items offered for sale are genuine and authentic (unless stated otherwise). Vintage watches are offered with no return if not listed as serviced. Vintage watches are used and subject to wear and use, may require service/adjustment in after shipping. Serviced watches were subject to basic hand cleaning or overhauled. Vintage watches are not tested for water seal/proof status. Vintage watches do not keep time like a quartz watch and even serviced watches may gain or loose time within acceptable standards for vintage watches. Please ask any questions prior to purchase. I am a buyer as well a seller on eBay, I understand. Please communicate if any issue as I believe most can be solved. Leaving bad comment is not a solution. I am a generous in feedback for buyer and I expect the same from you. Any questions?? Please feel free to ask! Buying or bidding means that you agree with my terms and you have no further questions.Items will be shipped within 1-3 days of cleared payment. If possible I will ship/post the same day.I will pack & secure the items as best as I can to avoid damage during shipping. Economy shipping usually takes 11 - 21 working days for the packet to arrive, but this is just an estimate, sometimes it may take a little longer or just few days. I always obtain proof of posting/shipping. If you want faster shipping method please let me know. Shipping outside the European Union can be made only on Monday's, it is the only day when the Post Customs Office it is open.RETURN POLICYPAYMENTI try to describe to the best of my knowledge.I do accept return & refund only if item is not as described. LET’S KEEP TRADING FAIR FOR ALL !! eBay is not a trial shop where you can buy something and return it a few days later, usually worn and marked.PAYMENT BY PAYPAL ONLY!! I expect payment within 4 days after end of auction/purchase. Local buyers can always use money transfer from local banks. Please contact me for details. Please keep in mind that the buyer is responsible to pay import duty & taxes or whatever other cost incurred from buyer’s country.
